channel.title: Go Humble! RSS BOOKS
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle books bundles!

item.title: MORE Tabletop RPG Resources by Dicegeeks
item.description: D&D resources suited for any style
item.content:encoded: Gather up your party for endless adventure with this bundle of tabletop role-playing books from Dicegeeks. This TTRPG explorer’s kit contains an amazing variety of rulebooks, sourcebooks, and campaign resources that enhance your favorite Dungeons & Dragons games—we’ve included standouts like The Book of Random Tables: Festivals and Fairs and The Book of Random Tables: Superheroes. Get everything you need to embark on an epic journey together, and help support Children's Miracle Network with your purchase!

item.title: Game Programming by Pearson
item.description: The perfect toolbox for game creation
item.content:encoded: Let’s start building games—level up your coding skills with our Gaming Programming by Pearson Bundle! Learn the basics and advanced techniques needed to develop original games that are only limited by your imagination. This 20+ library of extremely useful courses includes standouts like Roblox Game Development in 24 Hours: The Official Roblox Guide, Fundamentals of Game Design, and more. Get the resources you need to start a new career, and help support Girls Make Games Scholarship Fund with your purchase!

item.title: Hobbies and Games for Dummies by Wiley
item.description: Read up before hitting the courts
item.content:encoded: Have you ever wanted to pick up a new hobby? Learn how to play sports and create using your hands with help from our latest For Dummies Bundle. The experts at Wiley can prepare you for anything with ebooks like Manga For Dummies, Pickleball For Dummies, Welding For Dummies, and much more. Impress your friends and stay active alongside them today with our Hobbies and Games for Dummies bundle. Plus, your purchase helps support Safe In Our World.

item.title: Elfquest: The Dark Horse Collection Encore
item.description: Journey to the World of Two Moons
item.content:encoded: Discover the saga of Cutter, chief of the elfin tribe of the Wolfriders, and his epic quest across the World of Two Moons in ElfQuest, Wendy and Richard Pini’s long-running fantasy graphic novel series. This expansive collection, published by Dark Horse, includes The Complete ElfQuest Volumes 1 - 7, The Final Quest, and Stargazer’s Hunt. Celebrate 45 years of ElfQuest, and support World Central Kitchen with your purchase!

item.title: Linux from Beginner to Professional by O'Reilly
item.content:encoded: Break into the powerful world of Linux with this insightful collection of courses by O’Reilly. Our latest bundle will teach you the fundamentals to build upon so you can master Linux in no time. Start learning today from amazing courses like Learning Modern Linux, Practical Linux System Administration, and Python for DevOps. Get the resources you need to go from a novice coder and to a seasoned pro with a budding career—and help support Code For America!

item.title: Witchblade and Darkness 2025
item.description: Discover your new favorite comic series
item.content:encoded: Addicting page-turning comics are only a click away with our latest bundle. Within our Witchblade and Darkness Bundle, you’ll find amazing graphic novel-style storytelling catering to an adult audience. Experience rich stories of pain, power, and triumph in 100 issues of the original Witchblade, Witchblade 2024 #1-#6, Artifacts #0, Darkness #1-#20, and more! Top Cow Comics offers some of the best indie comics—take a leap and try them today. Your purchase helps support the Hero Initiative too!

item.title: Masters at Work Career Guides by Simon & Schuster
item.description: Your next career is only a bundle away
item.content:encoded: Unlock your potential and learn the skills and knowledge you need to succeed in a variety of desirable industries. Our Masters at Work Career Guide Bundle by Simon & Schuster contains 25+ ebooks that can help transform your professional pursuits with outstanding books including Becoming a Video Game Designer, Becoming an Ethical Hacker, Becoming a Crime Scene Investigator, and more! Begin your new career journey today and help support Worldreader with your purchase.

item.title: Mastering Every Database by Packt
item.content:encoded: Learn the skills and knowledge you need to master every database with this curated collection by the professionals at Packt. Inside this 15+ course library, you’ll get pro quality lessons like Mastering PostgreSQL 17, Amazon DynamoDB - The Definitive Guide, Database Design and Modeling with Google Cloud, and more! Deepen your understanding whether you’re a novice or a seasoned professional, and help support the International Medical Corps with your purchase!

item.title: 5th Edition Adventures, Crafting, Monsters and VTT Assets
item.content:encoded: Gather up your party for new takes on classic adventures within the Dungeons & Dragons universe—this action-packed bundle supports one of the most iconic games ever! Our 5th Edition-centric TTRPG explorer’s kit contains rulebooks, sourcebooks, and campaign resources like Endless Encounters: Dungeons, Ultimate Bestiary - The Dreaded Accursed, Deck of Dirty Tricks Vol 1., and more! Get everything you need to embark on an epic journey alongside your closest allies and help support the Comic Book Legal Defense Fund with your purchase!

item.title: Machine Learning Engineer Masterclass by Packt
item.description: Machine learning solutions for the future
item.content:encoded: Master machine learning with this comprehensive bundle of in-depth lessons from Packt. Inside this expertly curated library of 21 books, you'll uncover industry-leading insights from our newest resources like LLM Engineer's Handbook, Python Machine Learning By Example, The Machine Learning Solutions Architect Handbook, and many more! Whether you're starting your journey or advancing your expertise, this bundle offers everything you need to excel in areas like natural language processing, neural networks, and real-world ML applications. Transform your understanding of machine learning and help support Direct Relief, providing life-saving medical aid across the globe, with your purchase!
